notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: All authors contributed to the publication according to the ICMJE guidelines for the authorship (study conception and design, acquisition of data, analysis and interpretation of data, drafting of the manuscript, critical revision). All authors read and approved the submitted version of the manuscript (and any substantially modified version that involves the author’s contribution to the study). Each author has agreed both be personally accountable for the author’s contributions and to ensure that questions related to the accuracy or integrity of any part of the work, even ones in which the author was not personally involved, are appropriately investigated, resolved, and the resolution documented in the literature. DJP: Principal investigator; concept, preparation of trial, writing of protocol and manuscript. AC, AS, TC, MP, NH, DS, MS, TD, PT, RT, CW, HK, VY, SS: Study doctor; contribution to protocol revisions and manuscript. MM: Project manager; coordination of trial set-up, contribution to protocol and manuscript. RS: Co-investigator; contribution to protocol, trial preparations and manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
